andreafrancia.largefileviewer.LazyFileListModel.LazyFileListModel ( File  file  )  throws FileNotFoundException

Create a LazyFileListModel that read list item from the specified file.

Each element of the list is a line of the file.

Parameters:
file 
Exceptions:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
